content: Is this the appropriate place for the SMART HealthCard track? It's not BlueButton, but it is a CARIN activity.
I believe @Michael Turman set up a separate stream for this and it would be good to include a link here

Herer is the stream for the SHC Track at next week's CARIN Connectathon:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/284830-CARIN-April.20'21.20Connectathon.20-.20SHC.20-.20.20Track
